entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 p.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
